posts.post_content:
Asking $200 for this lot of five oddities

Casey - significant registration problem
Howard - Piedmont backed, but with Polar Bear transfer on front
Phelps - top of frame at bottom of card, plus potentially missing buff color
Randall - crop mark top left of back
and now adding
"the bloody wright" - way too much red ink disbursed on this card
added a card but left the price the same.
Great little lot o' cards! love the "bloody" wright:)
